claims.claim: Exscientia makes 10 times fewer compounds than the industry average
claims.quote: Using this synthesis-aware, iterative approach built on AWS, Exscientia makes 10 times fewer compounds than the industry average.

claims.claim: Exscientia has accelerated drug design by up to 70 percent while decreasing capital cost by 80 percent
claims.quote: Exscientia has accelerated drug design by up to 70 percent while decreasing capital cost by 80 percent, compared with industry benchmarks.

claims.claim: Six AI-designed molecules have entered clinical trials
claims.quote: Six molecules that Exscientia designed using AI have entered clinical trials.

claims.claim: Automated robotic lab can operate 24/7 with minimal human supervision
claims.quote: Thus, its lab—orchestrated by AWS microservices—can operate 24/7 with minimal human supervision

claims.claim: Exscientia raised $510 million in the largest IPO for a European biotech company
claims.quote: In October 2021, Exscientia achieved a significant milestone by going public on the Nasdaq stock market, raising $510 million in what became the largest initial public offering for a European biotech company.

claims.claim: Company grew from 5 employees to 450-strong team operating in more than 20 countries
claims.quote: From modest beginnings with just five employees, today Exscientia's 450-strong team operates in more than 20 countries and has six established global offices.

claims.claim: Centaur AI platform cuts drug discovery timeline from 4.5 years to 12-15 months
claims.quote: It achieves it in revolutionary timescales, cutting the industry average timeline from 4.5 years to just 12 to 15 months.

claims.claim: First AI-designed drug candidate created in just 12 months
claims.quote: It took just 12 months to discover and represents the first ever AI-designed drug candidate to enter clinical trials.

claims.claim: Achieved 75% prediction success rate in drug design methodology
claims.quote: The outcome was an automated and adaptive methodology for designing drug ligands to multitarget profiles with a 75% prediction success rate.
